items.sentence: Let\'s begin by considering the similarities.
Let\'s clean the entire office next Saturday.
Let\'s compare this dictionary with that one.
Let\'s discuss the plan over a cup of coffee.
Tom doesn\'t yet know what he\'s going to do.
Tom said he didn\'t have a driver\'s license.
Making pizza is something I learned from Tom.
I was trying to figure out why that happened.
I wish I had bought a ticket for the concert.
I wonder if Tom would really teach me French.
Tom didn\'t agree with Mary about the matter.
Tom didn\'t even get a chance to say goodbye.
My vet told me to feed my dog in the evening.
Nobody could remember the sequence of events.
Nobody knows what goes on behind those doors.
Nobody knows what happened to all that money.
Nobody told me it was going to get this cold.
He denied knowing anything about their plans.
He was seriously injured in the car accident.
He will be playing tennis tomorrow afternoon.
